This sequel continued on the original gameplay, but added new features to keep the title fresh.Ms. Pac-Man attempts to clear four various and challenging mazes filled with dots and ever-moving bouncing fruit while avoiding Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Sue. One touch from any of these ghosts means a loss of life for Ms. Pac-Man.Ms. Pac-Man can turn the tables on her pursuers by eating one of the four Energizers located within the maze. During this time, the ghosts turn blue, and Ms. Pac-Man can eat them for bonus points. The Energizer power only lasts for a limited amount of time, as the ghost's eyes float back to their center box, and regenerate to chase after Ms. Pac-Man again.Survive a few rounds of gameplay, and the player will be treated to humorous intermissions showing the growing romantic relationship between Pac-Man and

game.name: Mutant Storm Empire
game.desc: Mutant Storm Empire on the Xbox 360 Marketplace is a frenetic shooter where the goal is to take out anything that moves through levels and "belts". Defeat your numerous attackers in sixteen solo levels and a co-op mode that can be played both offline and on Xbox Live.

game.name: Novadrome
game.desc: Novadrome is a vehicular combat game created by Stainless Games, which was released for Xbox 360, through Xbox Live Arcade. It pits players against each other in an arena style death match. The game features three single player modes (career, arcade, and free play) and a multiplayer mode for up to 8 players via Xbox Live. Novadrome features 24 different vehicles, 15 different multiplayer maps.

game.name: Panzer General : Allied Assault
game.desc: Panzer General is back with an all-new turn-based strategy game in Panzer General: Allied Assault! For the first time on Xbox LIVEÂ® Arcade, recreate actual battles during the last phase of World War II and experience the dramatic events of D-Day as they unfold in your hands. Build, customize, and fight with your personalized deck of 60 cards. Play with a friend in multiplayer mode, gain access to special units and cards, and become a Panzer General.

game.name: Paperboy
game.desc: Paperboy on Xbox Live Arcade is the adaptation of the hit game of the same name. You play as a young paperboy on a bicycle and have to complete your task as quickly as possible. But beware of the various obstacles, namely motorists, dogs, skaters and other holes in the road.

game.name: Perfect Dark
game.desc: Available for download from the Xbox Live Arcade on your Xbox 360, Perfect Dark is a FPS from 2000 that has been graphically redesigned for the Microsoft console. Take control of Joanna Dark, aka Perfect Dark, a 23-year-old spy and member of the Carrington Institute's elite forces. Armed with the latest technology, Perfect Dark must uncover a dark conspiracy against the President of the United States. A multiplayer mode is also available.

game.name: Phantasy Star II
game.desc: Phantasy Star II on Xbox Live Arcade is a turn-based role-playing game. Accompanied by 3 other soldiers, the hero Rolf Landale is assigned a new mission by the head of the government of the planet Mota. He must investigate Mother Brain, the super computer built to run everything but which seems to be getting out of control.

game.name: Poker Smash
game.desc: Poker Smash on the Xbox Live Arcade is a mix between a poker game and a puzzle game. The aim is to clear the cards, which are laid out like in a traditional puzzle. Here, however, you have to align them to create a poker combination. A few items allow you to clear the slate and see more clearly. Online tournaments allow you to test your skills against other players.

game.name: Polar Panic
game.desc: Polar Panic is a puzzle and action game for Xbox 360 that features a polar bear that must be guided through his fight against Mr. Big. Numerous traps slow down his progress throughout the 50 levels that make up the game. A story mode, a survival mode and a multiplayer mode are added to this, to make the ice melt a little more...

game.name: Powerup Forever
game.desc: PowerUp Forever, the next-gen, next-level evolution of the top-down arcade shooter, offers limitless levels, enemies and options.

game.name: Quarrel
game.desc: QUARREL is the most novel word game ever made. But don't just take our word for it ? grab it now and enter a universe where WORDS (11 points) literally speak louder than ACTIONS (8 points). Use a cool combination of word power and strategic cunning to crush your opponents and reign supreme. Come settle your differences with wordplay rather than swordplay; make verbal not chemical weapons; load up with letters not bullets and use chatter to batter your enemies into submission and rule the world. Compete to use your troops to make the highest-scoring word from the letters given then capture territories and conquer islands in this wholly original virtual board game.

game.name: Raskulls
game.desc: Raskulls is a combination of a puzzle, platform and racing game. Players control a Raskull, who can run, jump and zap multicolored blocks encountered along their way. In most stages, the goal is to beat the opponents (up to four at a time) to the finish line. Blocks on top of the zapped ones will fall down, hindering or slowing down the contestants. It is also possible to grab power-ups and there is a fillable "frenzy" meter which boosts the player's speed when activated.

game.name: Raystorm Hd
game.desc: Raystorm HD for Xbox 360 is a high definition remake of the Playsation shooter Raystorm. The player takes place aboard an R-Gray battleship and must quell the uprising of an Earth colony through several levels of wave after wave of enemies.

game.name: Rocketbowl
game.desc: RocketBowl is a game on Xbox 360 in which you have to throw a bowling ball. Of course, you'll have to knock down as many pins as possible, but you can also take part in frenzied races on a dozen circuits full of traps, ramps and other springboards. On the track, you collect boosters to accelerate. As the adventure progresses, you can buy bigger balls and new equipment. Rocketbowl can be played alone or online with up to 4 players.

game.name: Rocky & Bullwinkle
game.desc: Based on the popular cartoon series, Rocky and Bullwinkle is an Xbox LIVE Arcade exclusive game that includes over 100 'micro-games' of various kinds. Some of the simplistic, swiftly playable-in-turn gameplay sections include juggling, shooting galleries, and a number of other Wario Ware-inspired micro-games, with characters including Dudley Do-Right, Fractured Fairy Tales, Peabody's Improbable History, and Aesop and Son.

game.name: Roogoo
game.desc: Roogoo

game.name: Rush'n Attack
game.desc: Rush'n Attack, available on Xbox Live, is an action/platformer in which you play as a Green Beret during the Cold War who must infiltrate the enemy camp to rescue prisoners. With your trusty dagger, you'll pick up weapons along the levels that will allow you to fight your way through. Customise your game with four difficulty levels and set out to save your fellow countrymen.

game.name: Screwjumper
game.desc: In Screwjumper, available on the Xbox Live Arcade, you control a former space miner who free falls through narrow pipes. The goal as you fall is to destroy as many enemies as possible by avoiding safety devices and explosives and collecting power-ups scattered throughout the pipes. A local or live multiplayer mode allows you to take the plunge with your friends.

game.name: Sea Life Safari
game.desc: Sea Life Safari on the Xbox Live Arcade takes you into the deep sea in search of the best shots. From barracuda to giant shrimp, you'll need to record every species present to help the old professor fund his research.

game.name: SEGA Vintage Collection : Golden Axe
game.desc: SEGA Vintage Collection: Golden Axe is an Xbox Live Arcade downloadable compilation of Golden Axe, Golden Axe II and Golden Axe III in their arcade release versions.

game.name: Shadow Assault/tenchu
game.desc: Tenchu: Shadow Assault is an action game for Xbox 360. Unlike the other episodes in the series, this version takes place in top view, abandoning infiltration in favour of a box system. A multiplayer mode allows you to extend the adventure to several players.

game.name: Shred Nebula
game.desc: Shred Nebula combines the best elements of arcade space-shooter action with free-roaming exploration and multiplayer excitement. Pilot the experimental R.I.P. Rocket through the galaxy in search of the Lost Expeditions ... no ship has ever returned from the vastness of interstellar space! This top-down, fast-paced ship-combat game features three loaded modes of play--Adventure, Score Attack, and Multiplayer. Play co-op with your friends, or go head-to-head in a deathmatch dogfight. No one knows what lies in the center of the galaxy. Will you be the first to discover the secrets of the gravitational region known as The Shred and make it home alive?

game.name: Shrek-n-roll
game.desc: Meet the dirtiest Ogre in fairy tales along with Princess Fiona, the Donkey, Puss in Boots and over twenty other characters in Shrek-N-Roll on Xbox Live. Traverse sixteen mazes scattered across four environments in the land of Far Far Away and test your skill in single player or challenge a friend in Versus mode. Combine forces with co-op mode and win the competition.

game.name: Skydive: Proximity Flight
game.desc: Using motion controllers, Skydive players will be able to fly through the air by simply waving their arms and maneuvering their bodies. Realistic graphics, precise sounds, and stunning aerial landscapes will provide an immersive and exhilarating skydiving experience. Skydive players can learn the mid-air tricks of professional skydivers and also make up their own tricks, either solo or with friends. Best of all, Skydive: Proximity Flight will make it possible for wide audience to enjoy the intense adrenaline rush of wingsuit flying - without the real-world safety risks.

game.name: Small Arms
game.desc: Small Arms is a hybrid platform, fighting and shoot 'em up video game, featuring anthropomorphic animals and super-deformed people, with ranged weapons. The gameplay can be compared to Super Smash Bros., Power Stone, Contra and Metal Slug.

game.name: Soltrio Solitaire
game.desc: In Soltrio Solitaire, play your favorite classic games like Spider, Klondike, FreeCell, and more, or play them with power-up bonuses, making your own playing cards in Voyage mode. Looking for some head-to-head action? Duel it out in heated solitaire games, or play cooperative with multiplayer solitaire.

game.name: Sonic CD
game.desc:
Itâ€™s time to usher the past into the future in this enhanced recreation of Sonic CD!
Sonic travels to the distant shores of Never Lake for the once-a-year appearance of Little Planet - a mysterious world where past, present, and future collide through the power of the Time Stones that lie hidden within it. Sonic arrives only to find the once beautiful world imprisoned beneath a twisted metallic shell. His arch-nemesis, Dr. Eggman, has come for the Time Stones and with them, will soon have the power to control time itself!
In order to put an end to Dr. Eggmanâ€™s nefarious schemes, Sonic must use the power of Little Planet to travel through time; breaking Dr. Eggmanâ€™s hold over the future by destroying his machines in the past and recovering the missing Time Stones!
Featuring 16:9 widescreen, achievements, leaderboards, and both the US and Japanese soundtracks, experience the adventure through time that introduced the world to Amy Rose and Eggmanâ€™s most evil creation, Metal Sonic.

game.name: Sonic the Fighters
game.desc: Join Sonic and friends in battle in this classic arcade game from AM2. Originally on consoles as part of the Sonic Gems collection, Sonic the Fighters is back with an all-new online mode, including both online versus and tournament play. In single player mode, choose from 10 playable characters and fight through 8 stages to stop Dr. Robotnik and Metal Sonic from unleashing the Death Egg II! Features include: True to its arcade form with all-new online modes, all 8 original characters and arenas, online versus mode for head-to-head matches, and an online room match mode for up to 6 players!

game.name: Sonic the Hedgehog
game.desc:
Sonic the Hedgehog (ã‚½ãƒ‹ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ»ã‚¶ãƒ»ãƒ˜ãƒƒã‚¸ãƒ›ãƒƒã‚° Sonikku za Hejjihoggu?) is a 2006 platform video game developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. The game primarily allows the player to use Sonic, Shadow and Silver across several stages. Other secondary characters also become playable across the game. The plot follows Sonic's quest to protect Princess Elise after she is kidnapped by his rival Dr. Robotnik (Eggman) and is aided by new and returning allies.
The game shares its name with two earlier Sonic games, a manga, a television series, a comic book series, and their eponymous main character. To disambiguate, the game has been referred to as Sonic 2006.[3] It was produced in commemoration of the 15th anniversary of the Sonic the Hedgehog series. The game faced multiple issues during development, which resulted in rushing the product despite existing bugs. Both versions were heavily criticized for long loading times, poor camera system, gameplay glitches, complicated plot and sloppy character control.

game.name: Space Channel 5: Part 2
game.desc:
It's the 25th century. Several lunar cycles have passed since Ulala saved human kind and repelled the Morolian invasion against Earth through dance. Life is quiet too quiet for Ulala until Chief Director 'Space Michael' reports that a mysterious dancing group is forcing innocent bystanders to dance and then whisking them awayâ€¦Here starts another swinging report show from Ulala!
Our intergalactic anchor girl must also must take part in 'Rhythm Battles', where she takes control of a musical instrument and plays in time with her opponent and 'Lyrics Battle', where Ulala gives her singing voice a workout in order to defeat the foes that await her.
A TV channel is only as good as it's last ratings and the same is true of Space Channel 5. Ulala must keep the viewer rating high, failure to do so will lead to the show being cancelled and the plug being pulled on Space Channel 5 - Space Michael is counting on you!

game.name: Space Invaders: Infinity Gene
game.desc:
Space Invaders, the game that defined video games for generations, is back with a new twist! The game starts off looking like the classic Space Invaders, but as you play through the game, it evolves. Unlock new stages, new power ups, and new features. The full game features a total of 143 stages from both Normal Mode and the breathtaking Challenge Mode where stages change with each playthrough. You can even blast your way through unique stages evolved from your very own music! Compete against other players from all around the world in real time with the appropriately named Real Time Rankings! Space Invaders Infinity Gene is the pinnacle of outer space shooting action!The more you play, the more the game evolves! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
Playable on Xbox One Xbox Series X|S

game.name: Speedball 2 : Brutal Deluxe
game.desc: Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe is no ordinary sports sim. It's a unique blend of extreme violence and stunning gameplay. There's stylish TV-style presentation and slick metal graphics, but when the play starts - the action begins. Train your team, work through the league, beat the other players to a pulp and win through to the championship. With a team management option, one and two player facilities and league, knock out and cup competitions to complete, Speedball 2 is the ideal game for lovers of serious ultra-violence.

game.name: Storm
game.desc: Storm is an atmospheric and ethereal 360 experience. Use natural phenomena to guide a humble seed to fertile ground where it can take root and come to life. Make good use of nature in all its subtlety and power, whether it's moving a broken branch, filling a small pond or making snow fall to solve puzzles and create natural paths.

game.name: Switchball
game.desc: Switchball is a 3D action-puzzle game, made by Swedish developer Atomic Elbow, which was released for Microsoft Windows on June 26, 2007, on Xbox Live Arcade for the Xbox 360 on November 7, 2007 and on PlayStation Network for the PlayStation 3 on September 17, 2009.

game.name: Syberia II
game.desc: Syberia 2 on Xbox 360 is the sequel to the point and click game featuring young Kate Walker. After finding Hans Voralberg, your journey is not over and the man insists you take him to see the mammoths. Venture even further across the globe and encounter forgotten peoples to help a man complete the quest of a lifetime.

game.name: Syberia
game.desc: Syberia on Xbox 360 is a point and click game about a New York lawyer, Kate Walker, who is sent to Europe by her law firm to buy an automaton factory following the death of its owner. However, an heir is still alive but cannot be found. Set out to find him on a unique journey that takes you to the farthest reaches of Siberia and takes you through atypical landscapes, for an adventure that is just as unusual.

game.name: Street Trace : N.Y.C.
game.desc: Street Trace: N.Y.C. available on the Xbox 360 Market Place is a racing game with added action. The title takes place in a futuristic world where different challengers compete on hoverboards in races and arena battles. Playable with up to four players locally and eight on Xbox Live, the game features four types of combat and three types of racing. The single-player campaign features 18 time trials and five championships.

game.name: Takedown : Red Sabre
game.desc: Takedown: Red Sabre is a shooter/tactical game for Xbox 360 that requires you to think. Move forward step by step, take time to aim, plan your actions and you will gain the advantage over more intrepid players. In this game, tactical units or special operations forces face small groups of dangerous opponents in close combat. Some levels contain small floating flames that need to be avoided. These flames can also reignite some of the candles. The candles are put out by blowing, with a button press, and this can also be used to push the floating flames back.

game.name: Tetris Splash
game.desc: Tetris Splash is a puzzle game downloadable for Xbox 360 on the Xbox Live Arcade. The title is based on the famous Tetris puzzle game, but adds a few game modes, as well as redesigned graphics. Several backgrounds are now available. In addition, the title can be played online with up to 6 players.

game.name: Texas Hold 'Em
game.desc: Whether you're a beginner or a pro, enjoy the thrill of the perfect hand or the perfect bluff. Test your skills in ring games and tournaments, or fine-tune your skills playing the scenario you always wanted to be in. Customize the game however you want. The comprehensive help provides details on each aspect of the game.

game.name: The Fancy Pants Adventures
game.desc: The Fancy Pants Adventures casts players in the role of the gameâ€™s hero â€“ a hand-drawn stick figure named Fancy Pants Man who embarks on a mission to rescue his kidnapped sister, Cutie Pants. Sporting his trademark orange pants, Fancy Pants Man begins his journey in Squiggleville, racing through more than 20 unique open levels filled with challenges and bonus rooms where he must defeat comical enemies and overcome clever obstacles. Along the way, gamers can unlock over 140 unique customizations including 40 weapons to help Fancy Pants Man in his quest to defeat the Pirates.

game.name: The Simpsons Arcade Game
game.desc: Waylon Smithers has just stolen a diamond from Springfield Jewelers for Mr. Burns. While trying to make a getaway, he crashes into Homer, which knocks the diamond out of his hand. Maggie catches it in her mouth, prompting Smithers to grab her and run off. The Simpsons decide to go after him, but Mr. Burns has tons of henchmen, who want to prevent the family getting their daughter back.The Simpsons Arcade Game is a conversion from the arcade game. It's basically a side-scrolling beat-em-up featuring the characters from The Simpsons TV show. The player can choose to play as each of the four Simpson characters. Homer, who punches and kicks; Marge, who swings her vacuum cleaner; Bart, who wields his skateboard; and Lisa, who uses a jump rope as a whip. Other weapons such as hammers and bowling balls are also available to use. The game's levels are Downtown Springfield, Krustyland, Springfield Discount Cemetery, Moe's Tavern, Springfield Gorge, Dreamland, the Channel 6 studio, and the Power Plant. Each level ends with a boss whose speed and strength will increase after taking a certain amount of damage. End level bosses are the wrestler Professor Werner von Brawn, a hot air balloon shaped like Krusty the Clown, a pair of bouncers, a drunk at Moe's Tavern, a henchman in a bear suit, an imaginary, gigantic bowling ball, and a martial arts sensei dressed like a kabuki actor. There's also the showdown finale against Smithers and Mr. Burns in a robotic outfit.Between levels, the player can compete against the other characters in two mini-games to be first to complete a task (inflating a ballon and waking up their character).

game.name: Thunder Wolves
game.desc:
Thunder Wolves is an arcade helicopter shooter with over-the-top gameplay. The game is set in 1991 and the player takes control of the helicopter pilot Max and his partner Blister. In thirteen missions set in four locations over the world, up to nine different type of choppers with an arsenal of weapons are used to defeat the terrorist group The Serpent that has risen again. The game can be played from a first-person or third-person perspective and throughout the actions the characters constantly launch one-liners.
Enemies fight from the air, sea and ground and there are missions goals to escort a group of soldiers or to destroy specific aircrafts. Helicopters have unlimited base ammo and a number of special weapons such as lock-on missiles and air strikes. Adding to the gameplay are some on-rails sections, a driving segment and a part where ground turrets are controlled. There is also a sniper section where targets need to be taken out using a scope. Helicopters cannot be upgraded, but their visual appearance can be altered.

game.name: Tower Bloxx Deluxe
game.desc: Tower Bloxx Deluxe on Xbox Live Arcade is like a construction game where you build towers by stacking blocks one by one. You only need to press one button to play, but a whole host of events (such as wind) regularly complicate the task.

game.name: Toybox Turbos
game.desc: Fire up the fun as Codemasters reboots the classic table top racing experience in Toybox Turbos! Collect & customize 35 vehicles & take on 18 crazy tracks built for chaotic, combative competition. Send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

game.name: Uno Rush
game.desc: Uno Rush evolves the typical rules of Uno into a fast paced card game where the old tactics of the game are thrown out the window. Each player can now see the others cards as each round begins. You then have a set time limit to play your hand, based on either the number or colour of the card on the play field. You can re-order the cards in your hand while you wait for your turn to arrive, and if you plan it quick enough, you can play all your cards in one move (matching a colour or number in order) while calling 'Uno!', all in the space of a few seconds. The aim of the game is, as always, be the last person to have no cards remaining.

game.name: Uno
game.desc: Compete against three other players to match colors and symbols, go Wild with special command cards such as Skip and Reverse, and be the first to play all your cards. Add-on theme decks offer new art and new card effects, keeping the game fresh and challenging. So connect with friends, choose your favorite house rules, and get ready to shout "UNO!" Three game modes: Choose from Standard UNO, Partner UNO, or House Rules UNO. House Rules UNO: Customize 10 different game rules to suit your preference. Single player: Go up against three computer players. Multiplayer play: Go online via Xbox Live against three other players. Downloads: Get add-on theme decks to customize the visual appearance and game rules.

game.name: Vigilante 8 : Arcade
game.desc: Vigilante 8: Arcade, available for download on Xbox Live, is a remake of the original game released in the late 90's featuring open-air arena battles between over-equipped vehicles. This version includes an online mode for up to 8 players, as well as 5 terrains and 8 vehicles to blow up in good spirits.

game.name: Warp
game.desc: Warp is a puzzle and infiltration game downloadable from the Xbox Live Arcade for the Xbox 360. You play as a cute and deadly little robot that can walk through walls but also cling to objects or enemies and then blow them up. The result is a multitude of possibilities for escaping from a room or simply emptying it of its occupants.

game.name: Wolfenstein 3d
game.desc: Wolfenstein 3D is a first-person shooter available for download on Xbox Live. The player must find his way through a Nazi castle and get rid of all his enemies. It is possible to recover lives as the game progresses as well as new weapons and other bonuses.

game.name: Worms 2 : Armageddon
game.desc: Worms 2: Armageddon on Xbox Live Arcade marks the return of the worms. The premise remains the same: several teams of moronic earthworms battle it out in arenas using ridiculously deadly weapons. Take into account the direction of the wind and the various obstacles between you and your target and launch yourself into a butchery with a tactical and random dimension.

game.name: Worms Revolution
game.desc: Worms Revolution is a new 2D episode of the famous Team 17 series for Xbox 360. Now featuring four types of worms with distinct characteristics, the player can use dozens of deadly weapons and use water or the many elements of the scenery to his advantage to slay his enemies. A four-act campaign is available and various online options allow players to challenge players from around the world.

game.name: Worms Ultimate Mayhem
game.desc: Worms are back on consoles with this Worms Ultimate Mayhem on Xbox 360. Featuring a multiplayer mode and various game modes, you'll have new weapons at your disposal to literally blast your enemies.

game.name: Worms Hd
game.desc: Worms HD on the Xbox Live Arcade marks the return of the first installment in the series, which has been redesigned with new graphics. The principle remains the same: several teams of stupid earthworms battle it out in arenas using ridiculously deadly weapons. Take into account the direction of the wind and the various obstacles between you and your target and launch yourself into a butchery that is as crazy as it is exhilarating.

game.name: Yaris
game.desc: (FREE GAME!) Hop into a Toyota Yaris and drive it on crazy tracks loaded with stubborn obstacles, cool powerups, and intense enemy action. The relentlessly twisted courses in Yaris might have loops or even be tube-shaped, but the Yaris never has to worry about sliding off track, as it defies gravity by scaling side-walls and going all topsy-turvy. Equip your Yaris with an arsenal of weapons to take out your adversaries, but be careful to avoid enemy fire, because once your shields are depleted, so is the game. Customizable cars: Drive either a Yaris Sedan, Sports Sedan, or the Liftback. Collect coins on the track and outfit your Yaris with weapons, shields, and tire configurations. Game modes: Race and take out your enemies in either single player or player vs. player game mode. Wild tracks: Drive on eight different tracks of progressive difficulty. FREE download: Yaris is a free Xbox Live Arcade game. Play it today. Gallery feature: Browse through the game's cast of characters, including all the Yaris cars. Twelve new achievements and new Leaderboard: Twelve new achievements to unlock, and a new Xbox LIVE Arcade leaderboard for you to dominate.

game.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Millennium Duels
game.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Millennium Duels is a Yu-Gi-Oh! video game for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. It features twenty characters each from Yu-Gi-Oh!, Yu-Gi-Oh! GX, Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's and Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL. This game follows the September 2013 List.

game.name: Zombie Wranglers
game.desc: In Zombie Wranglers on Xbox Live Arcade the player must defend Potters Field from a zombie invasion in a rather parodic atmosphere. Games can be played alone or with up to 4 players in cooperative mode.

game.name: Zuma's Revenge
game.desc: Experience new levels of ball-blasting action! Leap in and conquer 69 levels of Adventure mode. Discover four new Spirit Animals (at least one of them is a monkey!) and harness their abilities to power up your game. Dive in to the high-stakes Iron Frog mode: 10 levels, one frog. Can you make it out alive? Battle all 8 tiki bosses in the fast-paced Boss Rush. Enter the Weekly Challenge and compete for high score on a new level every week. (with Bejeweled 3 & Feeding Frenzy)

game.name: Zuma
game.desc: The Xbox Live Arcade version of Zuma takes the form of a puzzle game where the aim is to stop columns of balls from reaching the golden skull in each stage. To achieve this, coloured balls are propelled to form chains of three or more to make them disappear. Zuma has over 20 temples, each with several levels.

game.name: Battlezone
game.desc: BattleZone is a downloadable action game on Xbox Live Arcade that lets you try your hand at futuristic tank battles. You'll also have to collect ore and build your base with factories and warehouses. There are many parameters to take into account. You'll need to build your base with factories and warehouses. You'll need to take on the enemy base and surround yourself with several warrant officers to complete the game's many missions.

game.name: Burgertime World Tour
game.desc: BurgerTime World Tour is an arcade game available for download on the Xbox Live Arcade. Your goal is to stack different ingredients on top of each other to create the most delicious burgers while avoiding the wrong foods. Various multiplayer modes are also available.

game.name: Castlevania : Harmony of Despair
game.desc: Castlevania: Harmony of Despair on Xbox 360 is an action/platform game specially designed for online multiplayer. Up to 6 participants take control of one of the 5 characters offered, all taken from the previous installments of the saga. The objective is to fight your way through the enemies by cooperating to reach the bosses guarding each of the 6 maps of the game.

game.name: Crystal Quest
game.desc: Crystal Quest on the Xbox Live Arcade offers you the chance to play the mythical action game again. You will have to collect crystals on the screen while avoiding as many enemies as possible that emerge from portals on the edge of the board. The goal is to collect enough crystals to open the portal at the bottom of the screen and move on to the next level.

game.name: Days of Thunder : Arcade
game.desc: Days of Thunder: Arcade is the Xbox 360 adaptation of the 1990 film of the same name. The title does not offer you the role of Tom Cruise, but is in fact a racing game, featuring the cars from the film. There are four game modes: Fast Race, Time Trial, Rear End and Derby. A multiplayer mode with up to 12 competitors is also present.

game.name: Defender
game.desc: Defender on the Xbox Live Arcade is a side-scrolling shooter in which you control a spaceship battling green aliens whose goal is to invade Earth... Discover one of the greatest arcade hits of the 80s.

game.name: Discs Of Tron
game.desc: Discs Of Tron on the Xbox Live Arcade is based on the principle of Tron, a game released in the 1980s on the Amiga. The aim of the title is for players to compete with Frisbees on evolving platforms. A few small graphical improvements have been planned to make the software a little more beautiful than it was at the time, as next-gen is required.

game.name: Duke Nukem 3D
game.desc: Unlock the full version for 39 levels of mayhem! Wreak havoc on your foes with weapons like Pipe Bombs, Shrink Ray, and Freezer. Impress your friends on the leaderboards, earn achievements, and take advantage of the painless death system - rewind 10 seconds or 10 minutes, the choice is up to you. All new User Clip recording, sharing and uploading have been added and best of all - online multiplayer with cooperative and Duke. Match for up to 8 players through Xbox LIVE! What are you waiting for?

game.name: Earthworm Jim Hd
game.desc: Earthworm Jim HD on Xbox Live Arcade is a remake of the original Earthworm Jim action/platform game. In addition to improved visuals, the title also features new levels and a multiplayer mode that can be played by up to four players simultaneously.

game.name: Gauntlet
game.desc: Journey forth, brave traveler, whether warrior, valkyrie, elf or wizard ye be. Gauntlet lets up to four adventurers explore together as Thor, Thrya, Merlin and Questor, each with unique traits. Thor possesses unmatched strength, while Questor relies on swiftness and agility. Resilient Thyra excels at close-range combat, and Merlin's magic proves powerful from afar. Traverse the darkest of mazes, destroying vile beasts and claiming gold as your reward. Consume food to regain your strength, collect keys to journey deeper into the dungeon, and seek out potions to help you defeat your most powerful foes.

game.name: Gears of War Judgement
game.desc: Gears of War Judgement - 3rd in the franchise.

game.name: Ghostbusters: Sanctum of Slime
game.desc: Ghostbusters: Sanctum of Slime is an action-adventure video game developed by Behaviour Santiago, and published by Atari.[1] The game features four-player cooperative gameplay where players control Ghostbusters to defeat enemy ghosts.[2] It was released on March 23, 2011 for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation Network and Xbox Live Arcade.[3]

game.name: Harms Way
game.desc: Racing in Mad Max style in brutal deserts!

game.name: Iron Brigade
game.desc: Protect humanity from the evil Monovision menace in this Tower Defense Shooter from Double Fine Productions. Join The Mobile Trench Brigade! Use a combination of mobile firepower and stationary defenses to turn the tide of war in our favor. Customize your trench with thousands of possible loadouts. March side by side with allies from around the world as you fight your way through Europe, Africa, and the Pacific. The Mobile Trench Brigade. Walk with us.

game.name: Joust
game.desc: Retro-inspired from Arcade days comes to life Joust on XBLA

game.name: Karateka
game.desc: Amiga, AppleII classic Karateka rebooted on XBOX360-XBLA

game.name: Lucha Fury
game.desc: Lucha Fury a funny over the top wrestling game in cartoon 3d cartoon style.

game.name: Marble Blast Ultra
game.desc: The aim of Marble Blast Ultra on Xbox Live Arcade is to steer a marble through twisting courses from start to finish without ever dropping it into the void. This puzzle-game has many levels of progressive difficulty and is filled with bonuses that give the marble some special powers.

game.name: Marvel Puzzle Quest Dark Reign
game.desc: Bejewled but in Marvel style.

game.name: Minesweeper Flags
game.desc: Minesweeper Flags is an Xbox Live Arcade version of the famous Minesweeper game. Your objective is to find all the mines distributed on the playing field. To do this, dig and trust the numbers indicating the number of mines found on the adjacent spaces. Multiplayer options and a global campaign await you in this release.

game.name: Missile Command
game.desc: In Missile Command on Xbox Live Arcade you must defend the coast against mysterious invaders. Enemies arrive from the sky and you have a battery of three cannons each containing ten missiles to repel them. Once a cannon is empty or destroyed, it becomes unusable and you must manage your stockpile to avoid dying. The game contains many levels of exponential difficulty during which you must protect six cities from enemies.

game.name: NBA Unrivaled
game.desc: Paying homage to the old school look and feel of the arcade classics, NBA Unrivaled brings back all of the intensity and pulse pounding action - AMPLIFIED! Hit the hardwood with the 2009-2010 NBA season's team and player rosters with current stats, logos and jerseys. Ball your way up to the top of the league with unthinkable slams and outrageous plays to get the crowd pumped for momentum on your side! Momentum mania! As you play for points, you will also play to fill up your Momentum Gauge. Once the Momentum gauge is maxed out, the team goes into Momentum Mania, which boosts offensive and defensive abilities, allowing for flashier, bigger plays. Non-stop action: Experience electrifying effects, outrageous dunks, and fast paced action where no other basketball game has gone before. Authentic rosters: Boasting all 30 NBA teams and the top players from the latest 2009-2010 Rosters, choose your team to compete in full five-on-five team arcade-style gameplay. Multiple modes: Grab a friend to play in online or offline multiplayer mode -- player vs. player, or two players vs. CPU. [Tecmo]

game.name: Onechanbara Bikini Samurai Squad
game.desc: Onechanbara Bikini Samurai Squad sword slashing zombies.
game.description: Onechanbara: Bikini Samurai Squad is the first game for the Oneechanbara franchise for the Xbox 360. The sexy sister duo Aya and Saki use their swords and hotness to fight legion upon legion of killer zombies. Take on the monstrous invasion in a vast, infected city complete with cinematic storytelling, a distinctive combat system, unique character moves, killer boss battles, and co-op gameplay!

game.name: Orcs Must Die!
game.desc: Orcs Must Die! is an action-strategy game available for download on the Xbox Live Arcade. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, will be to defend your fortress against hordes of enraged orcs. You'll have a variety of traps, weapons and devices at your disposal to crush the orcs and drive them back to your home.

game.name: Pool Nation
game.desc: Play pool with your friends 8ball, 9ball ... Pool Nation

game.name: Rainbow Islands Towering Adventure !
game.desc:
The legendary Rainbow Islands game returns with a towering new adventure!
Every once in a blue moon, Holly's Comet lands at the top of the monster-infested tower on Rainbow Island. There, she gives humans Rainbow Magic to climb to the top and ask for one wish. A blue moon finally comes around and brothers Bubby and Bobby decide to challenge the towerâ€¦ Will they make it to the top and make their wishes come true?

game.name: Rez HD
game.desc: Original game from Sega Dreamcast comes to life on XBOX360-XBLA in HD

game.name: Robotron : 2084
game.desc: In Robotron: 2084 on the Xbox Live Arcade, you play as a mutant who must save humanity from the Robotron invasion. In this action game, you are sent through a series of rooms filled with enemies to destroy and humans to save. You can move and shoot in eight different directions. Note that you don't have to shoot straight ahead as the hero can send a beam in any direction.

game.name: Rumble Roses Xx
game.desc: Adult rated wrestling game Girl on Girl action.

game.name: Scrap Metal
game.desc: Scrap Metal is an action-oriented racing game available on the Xbox Live Arcade for Xbox 360. The game features customisable armed vehicles that compete in hardcore races or in top-down arenas. The title also features time trials, vehicle protection and one-on-one duels.

game.name: Smash T.v.
game.desc: Smash T.V. on Xbox Live Arcade places you in a morbid, but thankfully fictional, game show, where two fighters armed to the teeth battle it out through various arenas filled with deadly individuals. The aim is to do more damage than your opponent, while collecting as many gifts as possible.

game.name: South Park: Tenorman's Revenge
game.desc: Scott Tenorman is back and he wants revenge! Help Cartman, Kyle, Stan and Kenny take on Tenorman and his army of Ginger robots before they destroy South Park! Suit up as the boys' superhero alter-egos to track Scott and his evil forces through time and space in this exciting platformer. It's the ultimate fight to save South Park!

game.name: Star Raiders
game.desc: The action game Star Raiders, available on the Xbox Live Arcade for the Xbox 360, is a remake of the first ever space battle game released in 1979, placing the player in control of a spaceship in a first-person view. The player must destroy enemy ships as they traverse the galaxy.

game.name: Strider
game.desc:
The Strider organization sends their best assassin, Hiryu, to kill the villain, Grandmaster Meio,in the metropolis of Kazakh City. The game is a retelling of the "core Strider story" and its common theme which centers around Hiryu's battle against Grandmaster Meio. The game mixes together elements from the first arcade Strider game, the NES console game, Strider 2, his Marvel vs. Capcom fighting game appearances, and the original manga from Moto Kikaku.
The player control the series' main character, Strider Hiryu. The environment is freely explorable in search for weapons and items. Strider Hiryu's main weapon is his Cypher, a plasma weapon that can take several properties. Upgrades for the Cypher can be obtained by exploring Kazakh.

game.name: Super Contra
game.desc: Bill and Lance are back in Super Contra on Xbox Live and must fend off the alien invader, this time taking up residence in a military base in South America. Choose one of the two soldiers and, armed with your infinite ammo sledgehammer, wreak havoc on the enemy ranks. Opt for the co-op mode to play with a friend and unlock the various achievements of the title.

game.name: Tempest
game.desc: Tempest on Xbox Live Arcade is an action game in which you control a ship on a grid. He must get rid of his enemies either by shooting them or by pushing them out of the screen. But you have to be careful because each type of opponent has different characteristics and forces the player to adapt to what he sees, the goal being to get the highest score possible without dying.

game.name: Time Pilot
game.desc: Strap into your time ship and fly through five challenging time periods, each with its own unique enemies, hazards, and bosses. The full version includes access to all levels, Versus and Co-op multiplayer modes, a range of challenging achievements, and the ability to see how your skills rank against other players!

game.name: Tron
game.desc: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). The arcade classic is back! Re-live the excitement of Tron â€“ race life cycles, demolish tanks, dodge grid bugs and even square off against the MCP himself!

game.name: Unbound Saga
game.desc: Available on the Xbox Live Arcade, Unbound Saga lets you play as either Rick Ajax or Lori Machete, two extraordinarily talented fighters living in the underbelly of Toxopolis. Both must set out to defeat their nemesis, The Maker. Each with unique fighting skills, Rick and Lori will have to defeat a certain amount of bad guys in each chapter in order to move on to the next, until the final boss.

game.name: Vandal Hearts : Flames of Judgment
game.desc: Vandal Hearts: Flames of Judgment is a tactical RPG for Xbox 360. You play as six characters who must fight several battles to reconquer a vast continent. The aim here is to position your troops correctly at each turn, use magic and weapons and try to win without suffering too many losses in your ranks.

game.name: Wing Commander Arena
game.desc: The year is 2701. Go to the far reaches of the ancient Frontier and join or destroy what's left of the Kilrathi Empire. Form a unit and eliminate enemy armadas while climbing the leaderboard. With four game modes, nine maps and 16 player Xbox Live Arcade, Wing Commander Arena combines classic arcade fun with modern multiplayer chaos.

game.name: Wolf of the Battlefield: Commando 3
game.desc: One of the most popular arcade shooters is back! Wolf of the Battlefieldâ„¢: Commando 3 revives classic Commando action with an all new adventure. This frantic war fest combines precise, old-school gameplay with Hi-Def 3D graphics. Gear up and blast your way to victory!

game.name: X-Men
game.desc: Experience the classic 1992 X-Men arcade game right in the comfort of your own home! Choose from some of your favorite classic X-Men characters including: Cyclops, Colossus, Wolverine, Storm, Nightcrawler, or Dazzler. Fight your way through hundreds of Sentinels and battle classic super villains such as Pyro, The Blob, Wendigo, Nimrod, The White Queen, Juggernaut, Mystique, and the Master of Magnetism himself, Magneto!

game.name: Yars' Revenge
game.desc: Yars' Revenge is a shooter available for download on the Xbox Live Arcade. A remake of one of the best-selling games of the Atari 2600, Yars' Revenge has undergone a serious facelift, going from a 2D shooter to a 3D rail-shooter. The small ship of the 2D version has been transformed into a pretty young woman with mechanical and winged armour.

game.name: Pinball Fx
game.desc: Pinball FX offers several pinball tables for both novices and experts. It combines traditional arcade feel with enhanced gameplay and innovative features for a game of this genre. With the power of the Xbox 360, Pinball FX sets a new standard for realistic ball physics and graphical detail.

game.name: Bonk : Brink of Extinction
game.desc: Bonk: Brink of Extinction is a side-scrolling platformer for Xbox 360 in which you play as a prehistoric teenager. Armed with a headbutt to destroy enemies and teeth to climb walls, he must fight against dinosaurs. The game offers a cooperative multiplayer mode and is available for download on Xbox Live.

game.name: Double Dragon
game.desc: Double Dragon on Xbox Live Arcade is a beat'em all set in chaotic New York in the heart of the 90s. Alone or in pairs, you play as Billy and Jim Lee, two brothers teaching martial arts. The story begins when Billy's girlfriend is kidnapped by an urban gang. The two brothers then decide to go straight to battle with the opposing gang. This version offers a choice between original and HD graphics.

game.name: Bubble Bobble Neo
game.desc: Bubble Bobble Neo on Xbox 360 is the worthy heir of a family composed of several eminent members. Playable with up to 4 players, this is a remake of an old episode with two game modes, one of which is new. For the rest, you will still have to control a small dinosaur with the ability to spit bubbles in order to move through closed levels.

game.name: Dungeons and Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara
game.desc: As the first modern role playing game, the Dungeons & Dragons franchise from Wizards of the Coast gave birth to numerous products including two arcade titles from Capcom, Dungeons & Dragons: Tower of Doom and its sequel Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara. Both these titles are now being re-released with updated HD graphics and a wealth of other enhancements as a definitive double pack entitled Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara.

game.name: Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved 2
game.desc: Experience an unbelievable adrenaline rush from playing the latest version of the frenetic retro shooter Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved 2! Newcomers and pros alike will be blown away by the screen-melting intensity and insane new features, including six action-packed gameplay modes, new enemies, new scoring strategies, and a diverse list of exciting achievements! If thatâ€™s not crazy enough for you, try multiplayer mayhem for up to four players! Use power-ups in versus mode to boost your stats or handicap your opponent. Or team up with others in co-op mode. Play it all in razor-sharp 1080p to new pulse-pounding music!

game.name: AstroPop
game.desc: Fire your rockets and blast off to fast-paced, arcade-puzzle action! Astropop blends fast twitch challenge with an offbeat, fun storyline. Choose from four space pilots, each with unique abilities and weaponry. Then grab, group, and blast bricks to create combos and clear a path to the stars. As you progress, a mysterious link between the pilots unfolds against a backdrop of spectacular graphics, captivating sound effects, and myriads of scoring opportunities. Astropop's two different gameplay modes coupled with 33 challenging bonus rounds offer hours of extraordinary replay value for players of all ages and skill levels.

game.name: Gripshift
game.desc: GripShift on Xbox Live Arcade is a very arcadey car racing game with some platforming elements. The vehicles act like real off-road cars on crazy tracks, hurtling in all directions and flipping the screen. Make dizzying leaps and use weapons to blow away your competitors. Numerous game modes add to the fun, as well as mini-games and a multiplayer mode.

game.name: Gyruss
game.desc: From the original Gyruss Arcade comes new retro-inspired Gyruss with HD update.

game.name: 3d Ultra Mini Golf Adventures 2
game.desc: In 3D Ultra MiniGolf Adventures 2, players are challenged to navigate their ball beyond obstacles using the help of secret shortcuts, game-changing power-ups and traps to sabotage the competition. Players can also manipulate the game by using special pick-ups to destroy course obstructions or even interfere with competitor's shots. Gamers can bring their A-game as they play in matches of up to four players locally or online. The sequel also offers an intuitive Map Editor tool, allowing full customization of virtual courses and the strategic placement of power-ups and traps. Putt through over 50 fun-filled holes in diverse locations, such as a Haunted Manor, a Manic Museum and a Winter Wonderland. As an added bonus, players can choose from up to four customizable animated characters and are invited to play using their own Xbox 360 Avatars and watch as their personalities unfold in every course.

game.name: Contra
game.desc:
In the year 2631, a small meteorite has fallen into the Galuga archipelago, located 20km northeast off the coast of New Zealand. Two years later, a terrorist group known as Red Falcon has seized the island in preparation for an alien invasion. The earth's marines sent two members of their elite Contra unit, Bill Rizer and Lance Bean, to neutralize the terrorists.
As either Bill (player 1) or Lance (player 2), the player must get to the end of each stage, shooting everything in sight, while avoiding enemy fire themselves. The player can upgrade their standard-issue rifle into one of four different weapons, including the powerful spread shot.

game.name: Puzzle Fighter HD
game.desc: Street Fighter Puzzle Fighter HD

game.name: Bomberman Live
game.desc: Drop bombs with reckless abandon and blast your enemies into oblivion. Compete with up to eight players online as you battle through eight exotic arenas with your own customized Bomberman. Unleash your fury in ongoing tournaments to prove you're the best. Choose from any of eight all new arenas and start dropping your bombs, kick fiery surprises across the arena, and send your enemies to their doom. Ongoing tournaments will allow you to compete globally to determine who's the best Bomberman of all. Each Bomberman can have a custom head or hat, facial expressions and features, and a costume. There are over 10,000 custom possibilities, so you may never see another Bomberman exactly like yours. One of the greatest game series of all time comes to Xbox LIVE Arcade. Take control of your customized Bomberman and use your bombs to knock out your opponents, discover upgrades, and dominate the arena.
